name: Madhusudhan Govindaraju
content: Madhusudhan Govindaraju's Home Page Madhusudhan Govindaraju is Professor in the Department of Computer Science and also Vice Provost for International Education and Global Affairs (IEGA) at Binghamton University, SUNY. Madhusudhan leads the Cloud and Big Data Group. He received his PhD from Indiana University in 2002. [Research Interests ] [Publications: DBLP, Citations] [Professional Services] [Teaching ] [Students] [Contact Information] Research My interests are in Cloud Computing, Big Data technologies, Distributed Data Intensive Computing, High Performance Computing, Web Services, Semantic Web, Component Based Technologies, XML based Technologies, and Problem Solving Environments.
